title: How to use opencis
text: can install opencis Github using devtools package:
code: devtools::install_github("hmeleiro/opencis")

title: How to use opencis
text: package includes three group functions. first group used search surveys, survey questions timeseries. second group functions retrieves valid category codes narrow search queries. Read documentation understand use category codes search functions. third group functions used import data directly R.
code:
library(opencis) # Search for survey studies search_studies(search_terms = "preelectoral", since_date = "01-01-2020", until_date = "17-11-2023") #> # A tibble: 10 × 4 #> id codigo titulo fecha #> #> 1 14724 3411 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES GENERALES 2023 2023-06-08 #> 2 14718 3402 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES MUNICIPALES Y AUTONÓMICAS 20… 2023-04-10 #> 3 14629 3365 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2022. COMUNIDAD … 2022-05-17 #> 4 14605 3348 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2022. COMUNIDAD … 2022-01-07 #> 5 14558 3317 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2021. COMUNIDAD … 2021-03-19 #> 6 14541 3306 PREELECTORAL DE CATALUÑA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2021 2021-01-02 #> 7 14513 3286 PREELECTORAL DEL PAÍS VASCO. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS … 2020-06-10 #> 8 14514 3287 PREELECTORAL DE GALICIA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS JULI… 2020-06-10 #> 9 14491 3275 PREELECTORAL DEL PAÍS VASCO. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS … 2020-02-17 #> 10 14492 3276 PREELECTORAL DE GALICIA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS ABRI… 2020-02-17 # Search for survey questions search_questions(search_terms = "feminismo") #> # A tibble: 6 × 7 #> id id_estudio codigo titulo fecha_estudio titulo_cuestionario series #> #> 1 491141 10002 2828/0 0010 Rasgos… 2010-01-09 BARÓMETRO DE ENERO… #> 2 485492 1384 2401/0 0025 Rasgos… 2000-12-09 25 AÑOS DESPUÉS #> 3 493678 1202 2212/0 0008 Sentim… 1996-04-13 BARÓMETRO DE ABRIL… #> 4 479219 1144 2154/0 0036 Rasgos… 1995-04-04 CULTURA POLÍTICA (… #> 5 449988 1008 2016/0 0026 Rasgos… 1992-07-09 BARÓMETRO DE JULIO… #> 6 452793 985 1993/0 0009 Sentim… 1992-02-27 BARÓMETRO DE FEBRE… # Search for timeseries search_series(search_terms = "situación económica") #> # A tibble: 85 × 6 #> id variable titulo puntos fecha_minima fecha_maxima #> #> 1 2092 K.1.02.02.002 VALORACIÓN RETROSPECTIV… 223 10-1978 03-2020 #> 2 2295 K.1.02.01.003 VALORACIÓN DE LA SITUAC… 21 05-1986 10-2019 #> 3 2460 K.1.03.02.001 VALORACIÓN PROSPECTIVA … 106 04-1995 03-2020 #> 4 2462 K.1.03.02.003 VALORACIÓN PROSPECTIVA … 10 12-1986 02-1999 #> 5 2463 K.1.03.02.004 VALORACIÓN RETROSPECTIV… 15 04-1992 01-2011 #> 6 2464 K.1.03.01.001 VALORACIÓN DE LA SITUAC… 118 04-1992 03-2020 #> 7 2467 K.1.03.02.005 VALORACIÓN RETROSPECTIV… 11 02-1992 02-1999 #> 8 2469 K.1.03.02.008 VALORACIÓN PROSPECTIVA … 6 05-2001 11-2017 #> 9 3075 K.1.02.01.001 VALORACIÓN DE LA SITUAC… 364 06-1979 03-2020 #> 10 3076 K.1.02.02.001 VALORACIÓN PROSPECTIVA … 344 10-1978 03-2020 #> # ℹ 75 more rows get_study_categories() #> # A tibble: 213 × 4 #> id conteo codigo titulo #> #> 1 1 1356 001 POLÍTICA #> 2 1 24 001_000 Política #> 3 2 222 001_001 Estado, Constitución e instituciones #> 4 2 94 001_001_000 Estado, constitución e instituciones #> 5 210 56 001_001_001 Constitución #> 6 4 29 001_001_002 Fuerzas Armadas y defensa #> 7 3 66 001_001_003 Gobierno #> 8 551 22 001_001_004 Monarquía #> 9 5 197 001_002 Administración y servicios públicos #> 10 6 301 001_003 Cultura política #> # ℹ 203 more rows get_question_categories() #> # A tibble: 5,257 × 4 #> id conteo codigo titulo #> #> 1 1637 154084 003 DESCRIPTORES #> 2 1 1699 003_001 Ciencia #> 3 1 92 003_001_000 Ciencia #> 4 2 16 003_001_001 Ciencia espacial #> 5 3 117 003_001_002 Desarrollo científico #> 6 4 599 003_001_003 Investigación científica #> 7 4 122 003_001_003_000 Investigación científica #> 8 5 402 003_001_003_001 Métodos de investigación #> 9 6 402 003_001_003_001_001 Encuestas #> 10 7 23 003_001_003_001_002 Trabajo de campo #> # ℹ 5,247 more rows get_series_category() #> # A tibble: 4,433 × 6 #> dmid conteo dmvariable dmtitulo dmprquestion dmindex #> #> 1 235 1190 A ESTADO, SISTEMA POLÍTICO "" 001 #> 2 221 92 A.1 CONSTITUCIÓN E INSTITUCIONES "" 001_001 #> 3 222 24 A.1.01 CONSTITUCIÓN "" 001_00… #> 4 223 6 A.1.01.01 CONOCIMIENTO DE LA CONSTITUC… "" 001_00… #> 5 2535 1 A.1.01.01.001 GRADO DE CONOCIMIENTO DE LA … "

# ℹ 4,423 more rows # Read a survey study df <- read_cis("3411") print(df) # Read a timeseries df_series <- read_series("2092") print(df_series)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Héctor Meleiro. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Meleiro H (2023). opencis: Import Data Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS). R package version 0.1.0, https://hmeleiro.github.io/opencis/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {opencis: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)},   author = {Héctor Meleiro},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://hmeleiro.github.io/opencis/}, }

what: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)
title: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)
text: Search import data directly R Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS). CIS public institution conducts electoral sociological research studies Spanish society. CIS large database surveys can accessed website. package includes functions search surveys, survey questions timeseries, import data directly R.

title: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)
text: can install opencis Github using devtools package:
code: devtools::install_github("hmeleiro/opencis")

title: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)
text: package includes three group functions. first group used search surveys, survey questions timeseries. second group functions retrieves valid category codes narrow search queries. Read documentation understand use category codes search functions. third group functions used import data directly R.
code:
# Search for survey studies search_studies(search_terms = "preelectoral", since_date = "01-01-2020", until_date = "17-11-2023") #> # A tibble: 456 × 4 #> id codigo titulo fecha #> #> 1 14724 3411 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES GENERALES 2023 2023-06-08 #> 2 14718 3402 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES MUNICIPALES Y AUTONÓMICAS… 2023-04-10 #> 3 14629 3365 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2022. COMUNID… 2022-05-17 #> 4 14605 3348 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2022. COMUNID… 2022-01-07 #> 5 14558 3317 PREELECTORAL ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS 2021. COMUNID… 2021-03-19 #> 6 14541 3306 PREELECTORAL DE CATALUÑA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS … 2021-01-02 #> 7 14513 3286 PREELECTORAL DEL PAÍS VASCO. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMIC… 2020-06-10 #> 8 14514 3287 PREELECTORAL DE GALICIA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS J… 2020-06-10 #> 9 14491 3275 PREELECTORAL DEL PAÍS VASCO. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMIC… 2020-02-17 #> 10 14492 3276 PREELECTORAL DE GALICIA. ELECCIONES AUTONÓMICAS A… 2020-02-17 #> # ℹ 446 more rows #> # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows # Search for survey questions search_questions(search_terms = "feminismo") #> # A tibble: 6 × 7 #> id id_estudio codigo titulo fecha_estudio titulo_cuestionario series #> #> 1 491141 10002 2828/0 0… Rasgo… 2010-01-09 BARÓMETRO DE ENERO… #> 2 485492 1384 2401/0 0… Rasgo… 2000-12-09 25 AÑOS DESPUÉS #> 3 493678 1202 2212/0 0… Senti… 1996-04-13 BARÓMETRO DE ABRIL… #> 4 479219 1144 2154/0 0… Rasgo… 1995-04-04 CULTURA POLÍTICA (… #> 5 449988 1008 2016/0 0… Rasgo… 1992-07-09 BARÓMETRO DE JULIO… #> 6 452793 985 1993/0 0… Senti… 1992-02-27 BARÓMETRO DE FEBRE… # title: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)
text: Due issue SSL certificate CIS website following error may thrown Ubuntu systems: solve problem user must disable SSL peer verification option. following command must run session: understand disabling SSL peer verification option ideal may security risk, opencis issue, ’s problem CIS end side. security certificate presented CIS website issued trusted certificate authority.
code: SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate httr::set_config(httr::config(ssl_verifypeer = 0L))

title: Retrieve the downloadable of a CIS study. — downloadable_files
text: Retrieves list files can downloaded asociated specific CIS study. includes pdf html files (questionnaires, frecuency reports methodogical notes) zip files individual level data (usually SPSS sav format, always).

what: opencis: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS) — opencis-package
title: opencis: Import Data from Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS) — opencis-package
text: Search import data directly R [Spanish Sociological Research Center (CIS)](https://www.cis.es/inicio). CIS public institution conducts electoral sociological research studies Spanish society. CIS large database surveys can accessed website. package includes functions search surveys, survey questions timeseries, import data directly R.

title: Import a CIS study — read_cis
text: Download import data CIS study.

title: Import a CIS study — read_cis
code: read_cis(study_code, verbose = FALSE)

title: Import a CIS study — read_cis
text: study_code string study code. verbose boolean. Controls messages printed console.

title: Import a CIS study — read_cis
text: list length 2 following values: 1) data: data.frame individual-level data points timeseries. 2) metadata: data.frame series code corresponding name

title: Import a CIS study — read_cis
code: # If you know the study code you can just read it into R df <- read_cis("3328") #> Warning: URL 'https://www.cis.es/documents/d/cis/MD3328': status was 'SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK' #> Error in download.file(url, tmpfile, mode = "wb", quiet = ifelse(verbose,     FALSE, TRUE)): cannot open URL 'https://www.cis.es/documents/d/cis/MD3328' print(df) #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (missing(ncp))  #>         .Call(C_df, x, df1, df2, log) #>     else .Call(C_dnf, x, df1, df2, ncp, log) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x5563a0fee878> #> <environment: namespace:stats>  # If you dont know the study code, you can search for a study using search_studies() function: studies <- search_studies(search_terms = "gastronomia") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(studies) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'studies' not found  df <- read_cis(studies$codigo[1]) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'studies' not found print(df) #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (missing(ncp))  #>         .Call(C_df, x, df1, df2, log) #>     else .Call(C_dnf, x, df1, df2, ncp, log) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x5563a0fee878> #> <environment: namespace:stats>

title: Import a CIS timeseries — read_series
code: # Use the search_series() function to find a timeserie to import series <- search_series("presidente preferido") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate series #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'series' not found # Use the value in the id column of the search_series() output df <- read_series(series_code = series$id[1]) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'series' not found dplyr::glimpse(df) #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)

title: Search for CIS questions. — search_questions
text: Searches CIS questions using CIS search engine.

title: Search for CIS questions. — search_questions
code: search_questions(   search_terms = NULL,   descriptor_code = NULL,   collection_code = NULL,   since_date = NULL,   until_date = NULL,   study_code = NULL,   since_study_code = NULL,   until_study_code = NULL,   scope_code = NULL )

title: Search for CIS questions. — search_questions
text: search_terms string search terms. descriptor_code string (character vector one) descriptor code. descriptor code corresponds values codigo column data.frame output get_question_categories() function. collection_code string (character vector one) collection code. collection code corresponds values codigo column data.frame output get_study_colections() function. since_date string start date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. until_date string end date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. study_code string study code wanted. since_study_code string first study code wanted. until_study_code string last study code wanted. scope_code Scope level code survey sample ("001" national level, "002" autonomical comunity level, etc...)

title: Search for CIS questions. — search_questions
text: data.frame.

title: Search for CIS questions. — search_questions
code: # Search by search terms questions <- search_questions(search_terms = "feminismo") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(questions) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'questions' not found  # Narrow the search by dates questions <- search_questions(search_terms = "feminismo", since_date = "01-01-2010") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(questions) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'questions' not found

title: Search for CIS timeseries — search_series
text: search_terms string search terms. subject_code string (character vector one) subject code. subject code corresponds values dmindex column data.frame output get_series_category() function. since_date string start date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. until_date string end date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. series_code string series code wanted. series code corresponds values dmvariable column data.frame output get_series_category() function. since_series_code string first series code wanted. series code corresponds values dmvariable column data.frame output get_series_category() function. until_series_code string last series code wanted. series code corresponds values dmvariable column data.frame output get_series_category() function.

title: Search for CIS studies. — search_studies
text: search_terms string search terms. category_code string (character vector one) category code. category code corresponds values codigo column data.frame output get_study_categories() function. collection_code string (character vector one) collection code. collection code corresponds values codigo column data.frame output get_study_colections() function. since_date string start date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. until_date string end date search '%d-%m-%Y' format. study_code string study code wanted. since_study_code string first study code wanted. until_study_code string last study code wanted. scope_code Scope level code survey sample ("001" national level, "002" autonomical comunity level, etc...)

title: Search for CIS studies. — search_studies
text: data.frame.

title: Search for CIS studies. — search_studies
code: # Search by search terms studies <- search_studies(search_terms = "postelectoral") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(studies) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'studies' not found  # Narrow the search by dates studies <- search_studies(search_terms = "postelectoral",                           since_date = "01-01-2011",                           until_date = "01-01-2020") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(studies) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'studies' not found  # Use the scope_code parameter to search only national studies studies <- search_studies(search_terms = "postelectoral",                           since_date = "01-01-2011",                           until_date = "01-01-2020",                           scope_code = "001") #> Error in curl::curl_fetch_memory(url, handle = handle): SSL peer certificate or SSH remote key was not OK: [www.cis.es] SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate print(studies) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'studies' not found
